simple as that!

hey guys, I was having the same problem. I solved by... 

1. "right-click" the ableton.suite.8.2.8-ipatch.app
2. choose "show package contents"
3. go into "Contents" folder
4. Go into "MacOS" folder
5. "right-click" the "ipatcher" 
6. from menu choose "Copy Path> Terminal Path"
7. Open Terminal
8. Type in... 

"chmod 777" space "paste terminal path"

*** I copied & pasted the iPatch app into the Live 8.2.8 folder inside of the "Applications > Live8.2.8" folder... My terminal path was...

SO if you do the same by simply "right click" and "copy" the ".app" then you should be able to use the same terminal url and then just "copy" the code + url below and paste it into terminal!

chmod 777 /Applications/Live 8.2.8/ableton.suite.8.2.8-ipatch.app/Contents/MacOS/iPatcher

Okay so I got the patch running but when I have to select the item to update, and I select Live, it tells me "You can't apply this patch on that file !".

What am I doing wrong?
Solutions provided by @imkid works perfect, thanks for sharing this.
